mapper.select: SELECT `banners`.*, CASE `banners`.`resource_type` WHEN 'News' THEN `news`.`title` WHEN 'Video' THEN `videos`.`title` WHEN 'InfoCollection' THEN `info_collections`.`title` ELSE NULL END AS `resource_title`, CASE `banners`.`resource_type` WHEN 'News' THEN `news`.`cover_image` WHEN 'Video' THEN `videos`.`cover_image` WHEN 'InfoCollection' THEN `info_collections`.`cover_image` ELSE NULL END AS `resource_cover_image` FROM `banners`, `news`, `videos`, `info_collections` WHERE (`banners`.`resource_type` = 'News' AND `banners`.`resource_id` = `news`.`id`) OR (`banners`.`resource_type` = 'Video' AND `banners`.`resource_id` = `news`.`id`) OR (`banners`.`resource_type` = 'InfoCollection' AND `banners`.`resource_id` = `news`.`id`) OR (`banners`.`resource_type` IS NULL) AND ${ew.sqlSegment}
